list.definition:
SELECT 
c.name 
FROM teg_db.clients c
WHERE
c.status !=0
list.label: Cliente
list.name: varClient
list.query:
SELECT 
c.name 
FROM teg_db.clients c
WHERE
c.status !=0

list.definition:
SELECT
    l.name
FROM
    teg_db.locations l
INNER JOIN teg_db.clients c
ON
    l.client_id = c.id
WHERE
    c.name = '$varClient'
list.label: LocaciÃ³n
list.name: varLocation
list.query:
SELECT
    l.name
FROM
    teg_db.locations l
INNER JOIN teg_db.clients c
ON
    l.client_id = c.id
WHERE
    c.name = '$varClient'

list.definition:
SELECT v.name FROM teg_db.variables v 
INNER JOIN teg_db.device_locations dl 
ON v.id = dl.variable_id  
INNER JOIN teg_db.locations l 
ON dl.location_id = l.id AND dl.client_id = l.client_id
WHERE 
l.name IN (${varLocation:doublequote})
list.label: Variable
list.name: varVariable
list.query:
SELECT v.name FROM teg_db.variables v 
INNER JOIN teg_db.device_locations dl 
ON v.id = dl.variable_id  
INNER JOIN teg_db.locations l 
ON dl.location_id = l.id AND dl.client_id = l.client_id
WHERE 
l.name IN (${varLocation:doublequote})
